participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, Jessica strives to balance her roles as a mother and a partner, looking for ways to improve her relationships.
participant_1.background: I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better. I enjoy Pinterest for Halloween costume inspiration. I love using my camcorder to film my friends and family. I am a mother. I like to ride horses.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and artistic, Michael finds joy in capturing moments and creating things with his hands while being a devoted father.
participant_2.background: I spent quality time with my children and avoided the obligations of social obligations. I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera. I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night. I sew my own clothes. I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.

content.text: I'm doing alright. I'm a mother of 3, and I work in a medical office. I love riding horses, and I enjoy using my camcorder to film my friends and family.
That's awesome! I'm a father of 2, and I'm a photographer. I love capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera, and I love sewing my own clothes.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.
It's not too difficult to learn. I taught myself how to sew when I was a kid.
What's your favorite thing to sew?
I like to sew clothes for myself and my family.
That's awesome! I love wearing handmade clothes.
Me too! They're so much more comfortable than store-bought clothes.
What are your favorite things to do with your kids?
I love to take them to the park, and I love playing games with them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love playing games with my kids too.
Me too! It's a great way to spend time with them and bond.
